title: For Tayammum is it permissible to use a stone that covers most of the hand? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: ahmed from the uk says i use these stones for tayammum they cover the majority of my hand but not all of it is this okay if the stone if it's a rock yeah this is fine but if it's a small stone or a pebble and you just put it on here this is this does not do the job and allah knows uh best you
